Illusion is defined as:” a deceptive appearance or impression” and “a false idea or belief.” I can perceive the reality of the illusion better than the illusion of reality. I do not remember his name, but the Tibetan who wrote the book called “The Tibetan book of the Dead” described in it when he was around 10 years old, the lama that he was with gave him a slap in the chest, and the physical world transformed into energies interacting as patterns. It was an initiation for him to be able to perceive matter closer to its fundamental structure. The Tibetans spent 1000 years developing their sensitivity to another dimension of reality. I know everything is an illusion because of my perception of time and my memories of the last 70 years. The natural ways of nature have been destroyed and replaced with houses and cars. I am responsible for these changes and now I see the error of my thinking. I built houses for 40 years thinking that I was serving human development and individual families. That has turned out to be a big illusion. The last five years has opened up the world of energy, light and love which is all intelligently designed at its natural level. Atoms also carry the burden of consciousness and responsibility. 2020 is a year of action and also one of time. I have been feeling time moving at a very fast pace, especially as some very big events have just taken place and possibly no more than 10,000 people know about them. It is time to awaken to who we are and become aware of our own unique consciousness. I think we are moving very quickly into the shift of consciousness as planet earth prepares for her actions. By 2030 a mini ice age must begin so that she can renew her oceans and the creatures that live in them. At the same time mankind must give up on his crude and polluting technologies
